# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.0.7] - 2025-12-23
- Docs: migrate documentation to Docusaurus and fix GitHub Pages deployment (baseUrl and workflow permissions).
- CI: add GitHub Actions workflow for building and deploying docs to `gh-pages`.
- Repo: ignore generated Docusaurus build artifacts.

> For full details, see individual commits and PRs in the repository.
